li.a: What Happens at a Board Meeting

div.div: No contents are available

img.alt: Learning at Home
Remote Learning at Conackamack

img.title: #964ff09ed5ea45fc93d876498f21af25
img.alt: Readers Workshop
Inspire logo
img.title: Inspire logo

p.span: I sincerely hope Spring Break gave all of our families some stress relief and that you enjoyed the nice weather and got outdoors for some fresh air and exercise. Here are some new developments to help our families navigate this second month of remote instruction:

span.strong: Meal Distribution for All Piscataway Students

span.br: Effective Monday, April 20, 2020, the District will offer free meals to ALL Piscataway students. Each “Grab and Go” meal includes breakfast and lunch. Meal distribution will continue via our drive-thru pickup process at our existing 13 locations: all ten school buildings, the two Children’s Corner locations and the Board Office. Meals can be picked up between 9:30 a.m. - 11:30 a.m., Monday through Friday. Any Piscataway student can take advantage of this program. You may retrieve the meals at the most convenient location – you do not need to go to your particular school. Please bring student I.D.
All schools in New Jersey are ordered to remain closed until at least May 15. We will keep you informed of any reassessments as they occur and we will plan as necessary.

span.span: With the Governor closing school buildings through May 15, it is very unclear how things will look if we do get back to our schools this spring. In light of this, we will cancel all May and June field trips. Please contact your child’s principal if you have any questions.

We continue to make various plans for our summer programs: Piscataway Summer Camp, our Jump Ahead Program, AP Academy, etc. We will keep you updated as to schedules and enrollment opportunities when final decisions are made.

p.span: Please remember our guidance counselors and nursing staff want to help our students and families through these tough times. Please reach out to them if you need their help in any way.
